document_data.name: ''Potion of Bless''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of bless''''' were magic [[potion]] infusions popular among adventurers for being their ''"portable priests"''.
document_data.Powers: ''Potions of bless'' granted the imbiber a brief boost to their morale in the face of fear and a slight improvement in combat skill that increased their chance to strike a blow or aim true..
document_data.History: ''Potions of bless'' were popular among adventurers and were widely available for purchase from traders and temples of the [[Sword Coast]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
